channel.title: Hugo Tanka Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Tanka Theme

item.title: Flights
item.description: # Display all flights in the world airports <- read.csv("airports.dat", header=FALSE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE) colnames(airports) <- c("airport_id", "name", "city", "country", "IATA_FAA", "ICAO", "latitude", "longitude", "altitude", "timezone", "DST") airports <- subset(airports, IATA_FAA != '') flights <- read.csv("routes.dat", header=FALSE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE) colnames(flights) <- c("airline", "airline_id", "source_air", "source_air_id", "dest_air", "dest_air_id","code_share", "stops", "equipment") ################### a) suppressMessages(library(dplyr)) flights <- flights %>% filter(airline %in% c("EK","LH","DL")) suppressMessages(library(threejs)) f1 <- flights %>% select(airline, source_air, dest_air) a1 <- airports %>% select(IATA_FAA, latitude, longitude ) m <- merge(x = f1, y=a1, by.

item.title: Shakespeare
item.description: library(readr) suppressMessages(Shakespeare <- read_csv("Shakespeare.csv")) library(treemap) treemap(Shakespeare, index=(c("Play_ID")), vSize="nLines") library(dplyr) Shakespeare %>% group_by(Play_ID) %>% summarise(s = sum(nLines)) %>% arrange(desc(s)) ## # A tibble: 17 x 2 ## Play_ID s ## <chr> <int> ## 1 The Tragedy Of Othello 1130 ## 2 The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark 1046 ## 3 Antony And Cleopatra 1016 ## 4 King Lear 930 ## 5 Coriolanus 828 ## 6 Taming Of The Shrew 795 ## 7 As You Like It 793 ## 8 Cymbeline 745 ## 9 Romeo And Juliet 695 ## 10 Julius Caesar 676 ## 11 Merchant Of Venice 630 ## 12 The Tempest 628 ## 13 Henry VIII 596 ## 14 Comedy Of Errors 578 ## 15 History Of King John 527 ## 16 Midsummer Night's Dream 498 ## 17 The Tragedy Of Macbeth 491 library(sunburstR) str2 = Shakespeare %>% mutate(str = paste0("Type:",Type,"-","Play:",Play_ID,"-","Character:",Character_ID)) %>% select(str, nLines) sunburst(str2) Legend {"
